name: M@STERS OF IDOL WORLD!! 萩原雪歩

ability: 【A】［② Place 1 of your Character from Stage into Waiting Room］ When you use this card's 『ASSIST』, you may pay the Cost. If you did, choose 1 of your opponent's Character with Level higher than your opponent's, place it into Stock.
【S】● ASSIST 2500 Level 2 ［① Place this card from Hand into Waiting Room］ (Choose 1 of your Characters being Front Attacked, during that turn, it gets +2500 Power)

When the Damage dealt by this card is cancelled, you may deal 1 Damage to your opponent.』 (Damage can be cancelled)

【A】 This ability can only be activated up to 1 time each turn. During the turn in which this card is placed on Stage from Hand, when the Damage dealt by this card is cancelled, you may deal 1 Damage to your opponent. (Damage can be cancelled)

ability: 【A】［Place 1 card from Hand into Waiting Room］ When this card is placed on Stage from Hand, you may pay the Cost. If you did, choose 1 「寄り道」 from your Waiting Room, return it to Hand.

【A】 When this card becomes REVERSE, if this card's battle opponent's Level is 0 or lower, you may place the top card of your opponent's Clock into Waiting Room. If you did, place that Character into Clock.

ability: 【C】 If you have 2 or less Climaxes in Waiting Room, this card in your Hand gets -1 Level.
【A】 This ability can only be activated up to 1 time each turn. When you used 【S】, during this turn, this card gets +X Power. X is equals to the number of your other 《音楽》 Characters x500.

【A】 During your opponent's turn, when the Damage you received is not cancelled, if this card is in the Front Row, look at the top card of your Deck, place it at the top of the Deck or into Waiting Room.

【S】 CONCENTRATION ［① REST 2 of your Characters］ Flip the top 4 cards of your Deck, place them into Waiting Room. For each Climax among those cards, choose up to 1 Character from your Waiting Room, return it to Hand.
